data.title: International Conference on Sports Technology for Injury Prevention and Rehabilitation
data.description: The aim of the Conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet the share cuttingedge development in the field.
data.categories: Events in India related to Sports

data.title: Alibaba unveils RynnBrain AI model to power robots
data.description: The release marks a significant step in AI robotics for the Chinese tech giant.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: AI Startup Runway Raises $315M, Pivots to World Models
data.description: The vendor has focused on video generation since 2023. The transition to world models reflects enterprises' growing interest in these advanced types of physical AI models.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: EU warns Meta not to block rival AI bots from WhatsApp
data.description: The social media giant responded that the EU should not intervene, and consumers have many other options for third-party chatbots.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Mistral drops new speech-to-text AI models
data.description: The generative AI vendor’s models can be used on device.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Startup Introduces 'Large Tabular Model' for Spreadsheet Data
data.description: The company's AI tool was built to make sense of structured data, an area where large language models struggle.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: AI Lawsuits in 2026: Settlements, Licensing Deals, Litigation
data.description: The outlook for AI lawsuits in 2026 is still unclear. While there could be more settlements, the debate over fair use and copyright infringement will likely remain unresolved.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: OpenAI's Latest Platform Targets Enterprise Customers
data.description: The company said it developed the platform to address a growing enterprise challenge: While individual AI agents improve efficiency, they need to work more effectively across the business.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Enterprises Don't Care About Anthropic's Super Bowl Ad
data.description: The Claude creator's commercial pokes fun at the ChatGPT maker, which will air its own ad. The TV spot amps up the war in the enterprise AI market.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Robotaxi Leader Waymo Confirms $16B Funding Round
data.description: The robotaxi pioneer, which is owned by Google parent Alphabet, has expanded dramatically in the past couple of years and now offers driverless cabs in locations across the U.S.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Opinion Divided on Moltbook Social Network for AI Agents
data.description: The AI Agent-Only web gathering spot is attracting ridicule, and fascination.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Panic Rises in Legal Industry Due to Anthropic’s AI Plugins
data.description: The concern arises as plugins demonstrate how a general-purpose AI model provider can compete with domain-specific tech vendors and raise questions about the technology's potential impact on workers.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Nvidia, Dassault Systèmes to Build Industrial AI Platform
data.description: The platform will offer companies high-quality simulations to "transform" how industries are built from the ground up.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: Claude Plots a Route for NASA Rover on Mars
data.description: The 400-meter excursion across rugged Martian terrain, which took place in December, constituted the first time NASA has used an AI model to determine a path for its Perseverance Rover on the Red Planet.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Change is Coming to xAI After Musk Merges it with SpaceX
data.description: The move could be an attempt by Musk to prop up xAI's standing with competitors, or a redirection for the AI vendor.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Snowflake Deal Latest Move into Enterprise Market by OpenAI
data.description: The agreement allows OpenAI to place renewed emphasis on its models in the enterprise and provides Snowflake with a differentiating selling point for customers.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Combatting Cultural Bias in the Translation of AI Models
data.description: Although model providers are introducing translation models, much still needs to be done to ensure they accurately capture cultural nuances.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: New York Robotics Consortium Launches with 160 Startups
data.description: The news comes as the state works to place itself as a serious contender in the global robotics race.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: Process Mining Matures in the Age of Generative AI
data.description: Process mining software started out as an analytical and diagnostic tool and is now fully incorporating AI agents and assistants to automate tasks such as real-time customer communication.
data.creator: Shaun Sutner, Esther Shittu

data.title: ServiceNow and Anthropic Disclose AI Deal
data.description: With the partnership, Anthropic moves deeper into the enterprise AI market.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: Apple Acquires Israeli Startup Q.AI
data.description: While financial details were not disclosed, the deal is being characterized as Apple's "second largest acquisition in history."
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Google DeepMind Introduces Agentic Vision to Gemini 3 Flash
data.description: The new capabilities combine visual reasoning with Python code to improve image analysis and enable active investigations.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: Google's AI-Powered Chrome Further Transforms Search
data.description: Similar to Anthropic's computer use tool and OpenAI's Atlas, the new AI features reflect the shift from the regular search format to one infused with AI agents.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Mistral AI Upgrades Vibe Coding Agent
data.description: The update is a step forward as the company underscores its position as a European challenger to dominant U.S. players in AI-assisted software development.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: UK Watchdog Pushes for Google AI Opt-Out
data.description: As sites see reduced clicks due to Google's AI summaries, calls are mounting for renewed regulation.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: OpenMind Unveils Robot App Store
data.description: The company said its platform will improve robot operators' access to software and support robotics adoption.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: Nvidia Introduces New AI Weather Forecast Models
data.description: The models come as part of the company's Earth-2 platform, pitched as the first fully open AI weather software stack.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: Google Launches Low-Cost AI Plus Subscription in the U.S.
data.description: The plan was previously available in select territories around the world but is now being rolled out to an additional 35 countries.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Robotics in 2026: Building the Business Case for Humanoids
data.description: From household deployments to general-purpose machines, experts weigh in on what the next year holds for the robotics industry.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: Navigating the Next Phase of GenAI: Predictions for 2026
data.description: This year, enterprises will increasingly use and refine how they apply AI technology, balancing cost management with maximizing AI effectiveness.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Ai2 Releases Open Coding Agents Family
data.description: The release shows how enterprises need to balance cost with performance and highlights a rising trend in the open source model market.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Startup Plans to Use AI to Optimize How AI Chips Are Made
data.description: Two former-Google researchers launched Ricursive Intelligence in December. The company is already valued at $4 billion.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Debate Rages Over AI Bubble vs. Boom
data.description: As spending on AI infrastructure reaches new heights, questions persist about the long-term viability of data center investments and whether OpenAI can meet its lofty expectations.
data.creator: Shaun Sutner

data.title: Microsoft Aims for Better Inference Efficiency With Maia 200
data.description: As enterprises increasingly deploy AI agents that perform multi-step tasks, the chip addresses the need for more performance, cost efficiency, and energy savings in inference.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Nvidia Invests $2B in CoreWeave, Expands Partnership
data.description: The vendors expanded their partnership, boosting CoreWeave's standing in the AI infrastructure market.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Meta Pauses Teen Access to its AI Chatbot Characters
data.description: The move comes amid growing concern about interactions between chatbots and teenagers.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Microsoft Launches Vision-Language-Action Model for Robots
data.description: Designed to improve robots’ reasoning capabilities, Rho-alpha marks Microsoft’s offering in the growing field of physical AI.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: Serve Robotics Acquires Hospital Assistant Robot Company
data.description: The acquisition of Diligent Robotics marks the first expansion of Serve’s autonomy platform from sidewalks to indoor environments.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: VoiceRun Raises $5.5M for Full-Stack Voice AI Platform
data.description: The startup positions its AI agent development platform as meeting rising transparency and reliability standards.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: Enterprises Should Prioritize Governance Amid Agentic AI Boom
data.description: Executives from Accenture and Okta warned that the rapid adoption of autonomous AI agents is outpacing governance strategies.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: AI Startups Merge to Launch First Full-Stack AI Cloud
data.description: Lightning AI and Voltage Park are joining up to bring together AI software and GPUs into a single stack.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Anthropic Aims for Transparency With Claude Constitution
data.description: The updated document addresses enterprises' need to understand AI systems and how they think -- a critical factor for using them in applications that could lead to unpredictable situations.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Humans& Raises $480M to Build Human-Centric AI Tools
data.description: Just three months old, the startup is already valued at $4.48 billion and has garnered attention from Google, Nvidia and Jeff Bezos.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: OpenAI Targets Monetization, $1.4T Commitments by 2034
data.description: With the company investing massive amounts in infrastructure, prompting scrutiny of its finances, increased use of its products is a clear focus.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: OpenAI Expands Cheap ChatGPT Tier; Ads Coming Soon
data.description: OpenAI is evolving ChatGPT as it looks for ways to boost revenue while ensuring ad-free options for premium users.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: OpenAI, ServiceNow Enter Into Strategic Multiyear Partnership
data.description: The partnership reflects OpenAI's broader strategy to establish itself in the enterprise IT market by collaborating with major providers, while embedding its technology in their products without direct sales.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: Wikipedia Parent Announces AI Deal with Amazon, Meta, Perplexity
data.description: Under the deal, tech vendors are paying to access Wikimedia's data to train and develop their large language models.
data.creator: Scarlett Evans

data.title: How AI is Reducing the Administrative Burden in Sales
data.description: Sales teams are using generative AI to reduce the time they spend on administrative tasks, enabling sales associates to focus on their core responsibilities.
data.creator: Esther Shittu, Shaun Sutner

data.title: Gemini Can Scour Apps to Deliver 'Personal Intelligence'
data.description: The new feature works across Gmail, Photos, YouTube and Search to answer a user's questions.
data.creator: Graham Hope

data.title: Cerebras Poses an Alternative to Nvidia With $10B OpenAI Deal
data.description: The agreement gives Cerebras a chance to show if its highly touted wafer-scale engine can successfully drive giant AI models better than Nvidia's chips.
data.creator: Esther Shittu

data.title: AI Startup That Builds a Brain for Robots Valued at $14 Billion
data.description: Skild AI's latest funding round will help it scale its omni-bodied AI model, which is being developed with the aim of controlling any robot for any task.
data.creator: Graham Hope
